data.description: This setting allows you to change the direction in which the top and bottom skin lines are printed. Normally, they print in a diagonal direction. This is the fastest and uses both the X- and Y-motors. Changing the direction can have a visual effect.
data.img_description: This animation shows the lines pattern with a 0, 120 and 240 degree direction alternating [0,120,240].
data.hints: - Multiple numbers can be entered to change the line direction for each layer. For example: [90,0] this creates a horizontal-vertical direction.
